title: Can´t paste in whats app
content:
Saludos, desde hace un par de días hay un bug para WhatsApp Web que solo sucede en Firefox; si se copia algo de otro sitio web y se va a pegar en WhatsApp Web no permite pegar, simplemente no pega; si permite desde el mismo WhatsApp Web es decir si copio algo desde un chat a otro lo permite pero si es de una web a un chat no permite hacerlo.

Esto mismo le pasa a otra persona conocida, en otro computador distinto así que no es algo que solo me sucede a mi, y solo se presenta en Firefox, en los otros navegadores funciona bien

Agradezco su guía para una solución
creator: felipefuentesrojas

title: copy&paste problem with Whatsapp
content:
hallo Firefox-Team,

with Firefox 115.1.0esr I can not longer insert Text via Copy&paste into Whatsapp-Web as before (Version 2.2334.12) https://web.whatsapp.com/

seems that it's not a Whatsapp-Problem because e.g. with Opera there is no Problem. i already logged of and on freshly connected with Whatsapp but still no copy & paste (no Ctrl-V and also not right mouse paste). Drag and drop of files is not affected and still works fine.

is this a bug or are there any settings that have changed? especially for long links a copy and paste function is really useful.

Many thanks for looking in6o this yours dasepp1

title: Browser Caching Causing Stale Content on Website
content:
Hey,

Recently, our team has observed a specific problem that seems to be unique to users who visit our site via Firefox. While the site performs seamlessly on other browsers, such as Chrome and Safari, we have encountered an issue that impacts the user experience on Firefox.

Issue Details:

Symptoms: Users frequently encounter outdated or cached versions of web pages, even after updates have been made on the server.

Here is the link of the page https://swishtag.com/shopify-agency-new-york/

Impact: Stale content can lead to confusion, outdated information being presented to users, and a degradation of the overall user experience.

Context: We have implemented caching mechanisms to improve website performance, but it seems that the caching duration or invalidation process may not be functioning as intended.

Expected Behavior:

The website should consistently display the most up-to-date content to users, reflecting any recent changes or updates made on the server.


Best Regards David
creator: mdavidmichael44

title: Google websites often won't load + Whatsapp web won't paste
content:
Hi, i'm using firefox since many years and would like to continue doing so. Unfortunately I'm experiencing 2 big issues with the browser which other browser don't have and I would be very grateful if you'd help me solve them. The two problems might be connected.

1st issue: Google pages often don't load for about a minute Once every hour I have to research on google or other google-related websites such as Youtube, google docs, maps, etc. for my work and they appear offline. After about a minute of refreshing the page, they work again (note: this is no internet connection issue: the same pages work on other browsers such as chrome and I even switched to another internet provider hoping to solve the problem, without any improvement)

2nd issue: Copy-Paste doesn't work on Whatsapp web If I copy a link or text from a page, whatsapp web won't allow me to paste it in any chat. This too happens only on firefox

Things i already tried: cancelling cookies, deleting addons, re-installing firefox

title: Change in Browser Settings Leading to Website Display Problems
content:
I trust you're all doing well. I'm currently facing a page not loading situation and could really use some assistance. It appears that someone at my company office has made changes to the settings on my PC, and now I'm in a bit of a bind. I'm unsure about the best way to restore things back to normal.

As a temporary measure, I've installed the Waterfox, browser besided by my private Firefox Focus which seems to be similar in functionality to Mozilla Firefox, as a backup for my work-related tasks. However, this has brought about a new set of issues. Numerous websites, including YouTube, are failing to load correctly. For example, when I access youtube.com, I can hear the audio from videos, but the visuals are not displaying. Furthermore, websites like http://wishcodes.com/ http://wishcodes.com/ are missing images, and even my Facebook page isn't loading.

I've attempted to clear my prime Firefox browser cache, hoping it would resolve the situation, but unfortunately, it hasn't worked. I'm truly hoping to identify a solution that won't involve losing any of my data, bookmarks, passwords, or other critical information.

Would you be kind enough to walk me through a simple method to address this problem? I'm very eager to resolve this without resorting to deleting any of my essential data. I genuinely appreciate your expertise and guidance.
creator: emilieravin2

title: Not able to "paste" text on Whatsapp web on Firefox Developer
content:
Good day.

Im having an issue with my Firefox developer Eidition (v 117.0b9 -64bit), where im not able to "paste" text on whatsapp web since 18th Aug 2023. (pasting imgs is fine though)

Tested other ways to paste using right click / Ctrl+V but it didnt work.. and if i copy something from same whatsapp and re-apply paste, also does not work (again to remind, only pasting text does not work) !

Checking though other browsers "Edge" seems to be ok and i was able to "paste" text normally. I hv yet to check on the issue on normal Firefox Browser.

Using Windows 10. Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz 1.99 GHz RAM 32.0 GB


Since other browsers did not have this issue, i thought of raising this for Firefox devs to hv a look at it. Maybe some update done recently caused this glitch. So im doing my part in sharing feedback to improve an open source software which i use.

Thank you for the amazing browser.
